statements: UPDATE transportation_schedule SET departure_time = '2022-07-15 08:00:00', arrival_time = '2022-07-15 12:00:00' WHERE schedule_id = 101

UPDATE transportation_routes SET route_distance = 25.75, route_details = 'Scenic route with stops at popular landmarks' WHERE route_id = 5;

UPDATE transportation_routes SET route_name = 'City Center Express', route_details = 'Direct route to downtown area with limited stops.', route_distance = 15.5 WHERE route_id = 2;

UPDATE stops SET stop_name = 'Updated Stop', stop_order = 2 WHERE route_id = 5 AND stop_id = 18;

UPDATE Connection SET travel_time_minutes = 120, route_id = 101, station_from_id = 5 WHERE connection_id = 10;

UPDATE vehicles SET capacity=50, vehicle_type='Bus' WHERE vehicle_id=2;

UPDATE trips SET vehicle_id=3, schedule_id=2 WHERE trip_id=5;
